name: Washerwoman
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

name: Librarian
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play)

name: Investigator
description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

name: Chef
description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players are neighboring each other.

name: Empath
description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is 1 good player that registers falsely to you.

name: Undertaker
description: Each night*, you learn a character that died by execution today.

name: Monk
description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

name: Ravenkeeper
description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

name: Virgin
description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed.

name: Slayer
description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

name: Soldier
description: You are safe from the Demon.

name: Mayor
description: If no execution occurs while only 3 players live, you win. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

name: Butler
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are. You cannot be drunk or poisoned.

name: Drunk
description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

name: Recluse
description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

name: Saint
description: If you die by execution, you lose.

name: Poisoner
description: Each night, choose a player: their ability malfunctions tonight and tomorrow day.

name: Spy
description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

name: Baron
description: You have no ability. [There are 2 extra Outsiders in play]

name: Scarlet Woman
description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers do not count)

name: Imp
description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you chose yourself, you die & a Minion becomes the Imp.
